name: Arrr!
description:
Arrr! is a bluff game in which cheating is of the essence.

HOW TO WIN

To win, players must have a number under the decided number set, but higher than their opponent. Without getting caught cheating!

HOW TO PLAY

1. Place your bet
A player enters the game by betting coins. 

2. Set a target number
Both players throw a die.  The number obtained by the throws decides the number they will need to reach to win.

3. Throw dice
Both players throw 2 dice each:

- the first is revealed to both players
- the second is known by them only

4. Cheat
The player can then choose to cheat to turn the game in their favour. Doing so will increase the suspicion of the opponent, however. 
If the player is caught cheating, they will lose the game entirely. 

5. Raise bets
Players bet on their victory. 

6. Win?
The dice are revealed. The player with the closest number to the target win the pot. The game is reset and another round begins until one of the player has no money to bet.
